name: NSLookup
description: NSLookup is a network administration command-line tool available in many computer operating systems. It is used for querying the Domain Name System (DNS) to obtain domain name or IP address mapping information. The tool can be used to diagnose DNS and related issues and help resolve them. It provides detailed responses from name servers for troubleshooting purposes. NSLookup can directly query specific DNS servers to isolate and identify various DNS-related problems.
